patthana10.7:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.7:3.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.7:5.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana10.7:6.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.7:9.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana10.7:10.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.7:11.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana10.7:12.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.7:15.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.7:16.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
